title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Tourism (Transfer of Departmental
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Tourism (Transfer of Departmental 

Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2025. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 1 June 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited tourism (transfer departmental administration ministerial functions) order 2025 (2) order come operation 1 june 2025

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise,
text_raw:
2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise, 
performance or execution of any functions transferred by Article 3 are 
transferred to the Department of Enterprise, Trade and Employment. 

(2) References to the Department of Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport 
and Media contained in any Act or any instrument made under an Act and 
relating to any administration and business transferred by paragraph (1) shall, 
from the commencement of this Order, be construed as references to the 
Department of Enterprise, Trade and Employment.
text_norm: 2 (1) administration business connection exercise performance execution function transferred article 3 transferred department enterprise trade employment (2) reference department tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium contained act instrument made act relating administration business transferred paragraph (1) shall commencement order construed reference department enterprise trade employment

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts,
text_raw:
3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, 

Gaeltacht, Sport and Media by or under the provisions of the – 

(a) Tourist Traffic Act 1939 (No. 24 of 1939), 

(b) National Tourism Development Authority Act 2003 (No. 10 of 

2003), and 

(c) 

Intoxicating Liquor (National Conference Centre) Act 2010 (No. 
9 of 2010), 

are transferred to the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment. 

(2) References to the Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport 
and Media contained in any Act or instrument made under such Act and relating 
to any functions transferred by this Article shall, from the commencement of this 
Order, be construed as references to the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and 
Employment.
text_norm: 3 (1) function vested minister tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium provision - (a) tourist traffic act 1939 (no 24 1939) (b) national tourism development authority act 2003 (no 10 2003) (c) intoxicating liquor (national conference centre) act 2010 (no 9 2010) transferred minister enterprise trade employment (2) reference minister tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium contained act instrument made act relating function transferred article shall commencement order construed reference minister enterprise trade employment

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal
text_raw:
4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal 
proceedings are pending to which the Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, 
Gaeltacht, Sport and Media is a party and the proceedings have reference to 
functions transferred by this Order to the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and 
Employment, the name of the Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, 
Sport and Media shall, in so far as the proceedings relate to any function 
transferred by this Order, be substituted in the proceedings for that of the 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 9th May, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [174] 3 

Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment or added in the proceedings, as 
may be appropriate, and the proceedings shall not abate by reason of such 
substitution.
text_norm: 4 immediately commencement order legal proceeding pending minister tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium party proceeding reference function transferred order minister enterprise trade employment name minister tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium shall far proceeding relate function transferred order substituted proceeding notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 9th may 2025 174 3 minister enterprise trade employment added proceeding may appropriate proceeding shall abate reason substitution

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or
text_raw:
5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or 
under the authority of the Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport 
and Media may, in so far as it relates to functions transferred by this Order to the 
Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment, be carried on or completed on 
or after such commencement by the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and 
Employment.
text_norm: 5 anything commenced commencement order authority minister tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium may far relates function transferred order minister enterprise trade employment carried completed commencement minister enterprise trade employment

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in
text_raw:
6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in 
the performance of a function transferred by this Order shall, if and in so far as 
it was operative immediately before the commencement of this Order, have 
effect from such commencement as if it had been granted or made by the 
Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment.
text_norm: 6 every document (including certificate licence) granted made performance function transferred order shall far operative immediately commencement order effect commencement granted made minister enterprise trade employment

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 7. References to the Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport
text_raw:
7. References to the Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport 
and Media contained in the constitution of any company and relating to any 
function transferred by this Order shall, from the commencement of this Order, 
be construed as references to the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and 
Employment.
text_norm: 7 reference minister tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium contained constitution company relating function transferred order shall commencement order construed reference minister enterprise trade employment

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the
text_raw:
8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the 
commencement of this Order by the Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, 
Gaeltacht, Sport and Media, in connection with the functions transferred by this 
Order are transferred to the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment and, 
accordingly, without any further conveyance, transfer or assignment, on such 
commencement – 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

that property, both real and personal, vests in the Minister for 
Enterprise, Trade and Employment, 

those rights shall be enjoyed by the Minister for Enterprise, Trade 
and Employment, and 

those liabilities are liabilities of the Minister for Enterprise, Trade 
and Employment. 

(2) All moneys, stocks, shares and securities transferred to the Minister for 
Enterprise, Trade and Employment by this Article which, on the commencement 
of this Order, are standing in the name of the Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, 
Gaeltacht, Sport and Media shall, on the request of the Minister for Enterprise, 
Trade and Employment, be transferred into the name of the Minister for 
Enterprise, Trade and Employment. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [174] 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

6 May, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach.
